Rosario has decided to ask FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of sand, cement, rocks, gravel, and bricks, given that she wants to build a wall for her house. She hopes to have this financing and, in this way, begin construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, rocks, gravel, and brick to build a wall for her house.

loans.name: Diana Elizabeth

texts.es: Diana de 37 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que se gana la vida con su venta de productos básicos en su vivienda pero además vende comida para obtener mejores ingresos económicos, aprovechando la clientela de la tienda. Ella habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 3 hijos que son su mayor orgullo y se encuentran estudiando gracias a su apoyo. Diana desea instalar ladrillo de piso en su vivienda ya que actualmente es de tierra y ella desea mejorar la calidad de vida  de su familia de esta manera, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: ladrillo de piso, cemento, arena y mano de obra para instalar ladrillo de piso en su vivienda.
texts.en: Diana, 37 years old, is an enterprising woman who earns her living selling basic products in her house, but she also sells food to get more income, making the most of the customers in the store. She lives in her own house with her 3 children, who are her greatest pride and are students, thanks to her support. Diana wants to install a brick floor in her house since currently it is a dirt floor and she wants to improve her family's quality of life in this way, so she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in floor bricks, cement, sand, and pay labor costs to install a brick floor in her house.

loans.use: to purchase in floor bricks, cement, sand, and pay labor costs to install a brick floor in her house.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel de 28 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida desde hace mucho tiempo. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida dando mantenimiento en un centro educativo, desde hace 2 años por lo que es reconocido por su actitud solidaria y amigable. Manuel desea construir un corredor en su vivienda ya que en invierno el agua ingresa a su vivienda y la puerta de esta se está deteriorando, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, lámina galvanizada, polines y pines para construir un corredor en su vivienda y de esta manera proteger la puerta de la misma y sus pocas pertenencias.
texts.en:
Manuel is 28 years old. He has lived in his own home with his life partner for a long time. He is a hard-working man who, for the past two years, has made a living performing maintenance for a school. He is known for his friendly and supportive attitude.  

Manuel wishes to build a veranda outside his home because in the winter water enters his home and the door of the house is deteriorating. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, corrugated sheets of metal, beams, and pins to build a veranda outside his house. This way, he will be able to protect the door of his house as well as his few belongings.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, corrugated sheets of metal, beams, and pins to build a veranda outside his house.

loans.name: Cristabel Aleli

texts.es: Cristabel tiene 41 años de edad y junto a su esposo van sacando adelante a su familia. Cristabel posee un negocio de tienda el cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de productos dado que desea aprovechar esta temporada que es cundo sus clientes aumentan la demanda. Con el monto solicitado comprará: cereales, golosinas, pan dulce, detergentes, lácteos y de más productos demandados por sus clientes.
texts.en: Cristabel is 41 years old and, with her husband, they are getting their family ahead. Cristabel has a shop which, with a lot of effort, she has managed to establish. With the desire to improve her living conditions, she has decided to ask FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of products given that she wants to take advantage of this season which is when her customers increase their demand. With the amount requested, she will purchase cereals, sweets, pastries, detergents, dairy products, and other products demanded by her customers.

loans.use: to purchase cereals, sweets, pastries, detergents, and dairy products for her store.

loans.name: Imbabazi Group

texts.en:
Imbabazi is a group led by Seraphine, who is 29 years old. The group name means “Mercy” in English.

She has been a group leader for four years. She has a shop and has been in a business for eight years. The group members sell different items, and they have same idea for changing their lives.

With the loan, Seraphine would like to buy rice, sugar, and soap to resell. The profits from the business will be used to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and soap to resell.

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 31 years old. She is married with four children aged between 7 and 13 years, and all of them go to school. She has a shop and has been in a business for five years. With the loan, she would like to buy more soap, colgate and biscuits to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more soap, colgate and biscuits to sell.

loans.name: Osmar Elias

texts.es: Osmar tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida. Él es un joven muy trabajador quien desde hace mucho tiempo trabaja como ayudante de albañil. Osmar desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc. Espera pode contar con este financiamiento y de esta forma mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Osmar is 22 years old. He lives in his own house with his life partner. He is a very hard-working young man who has worked as an assistant bricklayer for a long time.

Osmar wishes to build a bedroom. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, brick, iron, etc. He hopes to be able to count on this loan so that, in this way, he can improve his quality of life as well as that of his family.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, brick, iron, etc. to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Abadasigana Group

texts.en: ABADASIGANA is a group led by Baziki, who is 39 years old. The group name means “Together as one” in English. He has been a group leader for five years, and has a shop and has been in a business for five years. With the loan, he would like to buy more sugar, soap and rice to resell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and renovate his house.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, soap and rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in chickens, concentrated feed, and vitamins

loans.name: Korubeho Group

texts.en: KORUBEHO is a group led by Godeberthe, who is 30 years old. The group name means “work for live” in English. She has been a group leader for five years, and she has a restaurant and has been in a business for five years. With the loan, she would like to buy rice, bananas and meat for making more food to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and to renovate her house

loans.use: to buy rice, bananas and meat for making more food to sell.

loans.name: Providence

texts.en: Providence is 48 years old. She is married with four children aged between 14 and 23 years, and all of them go to school. She has a shop and has been in a business for 10 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more sweet bananas and snacks to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living and to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more sweet bananas and snacks to sell.

loans.name: Francoise

texts.en: Francoise is 40 years old. She is married with three children aged between 10 and 19 years, and all of them go to school. She has a shop and has been in a business for 14 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more cooking oil, maize flour, and soap to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: to buy more cooking oil, maize flour and soap to sell.

loans.name: Marcela Tatiana

texts.es: Marcela de 22 años de edad es una joven emprendedora que se gana la vida con su tienda de productos básicos con la que cuenta desde hace 2 años, pero además ejerce la cosmetología en su vivienda obteniendo mejores ingresos económicos. Ella habita en vivienda propia junto a su abuelo que es su mayor apoyo. Marcela desea invertir en su tienda ya que en época navideña las ventas aumentan y ella desea ofrecer a su clientela la cantidad de productos necesaria para satisfacer la demanda de productos, para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: golosinas, azúcar, café, arroz, frijoles, bebidas frías, etc.
texts.en:
Marcela is 22 years old and she is an enterprising young woman who earns a living with her shop for basic products, which she has had for 2 years. She also works as a cosmetologist in her home, earning more income. She lives in a house of her own with her grandfather, who is her biggest support.

Marcela wants to invest in her shop, because her sales go up during the Christmas season, and she wants to offer her clientele enough products to satisfy the demand. She is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in candies, sugar, coffee, rice, beans and cold drinks.

loans.use: to invest in candies, sugar, coffee, rice, beans and cold drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in chickens, animal feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Annonciata

texts.en: Annociata is 55 years old. She is married with two children aged between 19 and 35 years, and one of them goes to school. She sells foodstuffs and has been in a business for 20 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more soya beans and beans to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standards of living and to pay school fees for her child.

loans.use: to buy more soya beans and beans to sell.

loans.name: Albertine

texts.en: Albertine is 51 years old. She is married with four children aged between 18 and 27 years, all of whom go to school. She has a shop and has been in a business for 15 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more vegetables, cooking oil and sugar to resell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and pay school fees for children.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables, cooking oil and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Denyse

texts.en: Denyse is 29 years old. She is married with two children aged between 1 and 3 years, and one of them goes to school. She has super market and has been in a business for two years. With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, yogurt and bread to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, yogurt and bread to sell.

loans.name: Duhuzimbaraga Group

texts.en: Esperance is 39 years old. She is married with two children aged between 6 and 9 year, all of whom go to school. The group is called Duhuzimbaraga means “sharing power” in English. The members of the group sell different products and they have common goals to scale their businesses to improve their future. She has a shop and has been in a business for six years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, cooking oil and sugar to resell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more rice, cooking oil and sugar to resell.

loans.name: Dukorekare Group

texts.en: Josephine, age 43, is a group leader. She is married with two children ages 5 and 14 years, and both of them go to school. The group is called DUKOREKARE means “Work earlier” in English. They sell different products and they wish to expand their businesses to make their futures better. She sells charcoal and has been in a business for nine years. With the loan, she would like to buy more charcoal to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand her business and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Abatiganda Group

texts.en: Abatiganda is a group led by Madoleine, who is 24 years old. The group name means “encouraged people” in English. She has been a group leader for three years. She has a shop and has been in a business for five years. The group members sell different items and they have the same idea for changing their lives. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, biscuits and soap to resell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more rice, biscuits and soap to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in corn, powdered lime, and cold drinks

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent is 34 years old. He is married with three children who are aged between 2 and 9 years old; two of them go to school. He has a shop and has been in a business for seven years. With the loan, he would like to buy more sugar, maize flour and cooking oil to resell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: To buy more sugar, maize flour and cooking oil to resell.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Luis de 48 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijas que ya son mayores de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida con su negocio de elaboración y venta de lácteos actividad que realiza desde hace 25 años lo que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida, además gracias a su experiencia cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus productos por encargo. Luis desea invertir en su negocio de lácteos ya que desea tener una mayor producción que le permita tener productos para ofrecer a una mayor cantidad de clientes, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: queso duro blando y fresco, crema, requesón, etc.
texts.en:
Luis is 48 years old, and he lives in a home of his own with his wife and two daughters who are adults. He is a hard-working man who earns a living with his business making and selling dairy products. He has worked in this for more than 25 years, which has helped him to get ahead with his family and to improve his quality of life. Thanks to his experience, he has many clients who request custom products.

Luis wants to invest in his dairy business, because he wants to have a higher production to have products to offer to more clients. This is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in hard, soft and fresh cheese, cream and cottage cheese.

loans.use: to invest in hard, soft and fresh cheese, cream, and cottage cheese.

loans.name: Abadahemuka Group

texts.en:
Abadahemuku is a group led by Patricie who is 45 years old. The group's name means “respectful” in English. 

Patricie has been a group leader for 6 years. She sells food stuffs and has been running her business for 9 years. 

The group's members sell different items, and they have the common goal of changing their lives for the better. 

With her loan portion, Patricie would like to buy more beans and maize to resell. The profits from her business will be used to improve her standards of living.

loans.use: to buy more beans and maize to resell.

loans.name: Nhóm 82 Thắng Lộc, Ngư Lộc Group

texts.en:
Đông is 39 years old and she is married with three children. She operates a food stall selling fish. She has been involved in this business for five years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.

Đông is the group leader of the Nhóm 82 Thắng Lộc, Ngư Lộc solidarity group, which consists of five members.

In 2012, Đông joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Đông hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Dufatanye Group

texts.en: DUFATANYE is a group led by Catheline, who is 32 years old. The group name means “altogether” in English. She has been a group leader for five years. She has a shop and has been in a business for 10 years. The group members sell different items and they have the same ideas for changing their lives. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar and lotions to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar and lotions to sell.

loans.name: Mariela Elizabeth

texts.es: Mariela de 25 años de edad es una mujer inteligente que se gana la vida en una empresa cercana desde hace 3 años, además observando la posibilidad de vender productos con sus compañeros de trabajo decidió invertir en prendas de vestir las cuales vende entre sus compañero de trabajo. Mariela sabe que en la temporada navideña las ventas son mejores y desea tener la cantidad de productos suficientes para ofrecer a sus clientes, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: prendas de vestir como pantalones, camisas, faldas, blusas, camisetas, zapatos, productos de belleza, etc.
texts.en:
Mariela is 25 years old. She is an intelligent woman who has earned her living in a nearby company for three years. In addition, noticing the possibility of selling products to her coworkers, she decided to invest in clothing, which she sells among her coworkers. 

Mariela knows that sales are better during the Christmas season, so she would like to have enough products to sell to her customers. That's why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in garments like pants, shirts, skirts, blouses, t-shirts, and shoes, as well as beauty products.

loans.use: to invest in garments such as pants, shirts, skirts, blouses, t-shirts, shoes, beauty products, etc.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en:
Hoa is 43 years old and she is married with three children. She lives in Hau Loc district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. She operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Hoa faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet. This is Hoa's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Hoa hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Tùng

texts.en:
Mr. Tùng works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture. Tùng has been involved in this business for nine years.

The main hardship that Tùng faces in his life is not having a latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

Tùng is 32 years old, and he is married with two children. Tùng lives  in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tùng's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With his business profit, Tùng hopes for his family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for his business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: 020507020003 Đông Ngọc _ Hoằng Phong Group

texts.en:
Ngân works in agriculture, raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Ngân is 51 years old and she is married with three children. She is the leader of a three-member group, the 020507020003 Đông Ngọc _ Hoằng Phong solidarity group. Vinh lives  in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2008, Ngân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Ngân has successfully repaid 7 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Ngân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Ngân faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Ngân hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and to maintain  a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 51 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que habita junto a sus 3 hijas de 22, 20 y 18 años de edad en vivienda propia desde hace muchos años por lo que es muy reconocido por sus vecinos como un hombre responsable y trabajador. Él se desempeña como jornalero desde hace 25 años lo que le ha permitido sacar adelante a sus hijas ya mayores de edad que se encuentran estudiando con su apoyo. Santos desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para sus hijas ya que siente que viven en hacinamiento y e desea darles una mayor comodidad, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: arena, hierro, grava, ladrillo y cemento para construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Santos is 51 years old. He is a hardworking man who has lived for many years in his own house with his three daughters, who are 22, 20, and 18 years old. He is well-known among his neighbors as a responsible and hardworking man. He has worked as a day laborer for 25 years, which has allowed him to provide for his daughters, who are now adults studying with his support. 

Santos would like to build a bedroom for his daughters. He feels that they are living in overcrowded conditions and he would like to make them more comfortable. That's why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in sand, metal, gravel, brick, and cement in order to build a bedroom on his house.

loans.use: to invest in sand, metal, gravel, brick, and cement to build a bedroom on his house.

loans.name: 020505050004 Đình Sen _ Hoằng Phong Group

texts.en:
Mrs Liệu works in agriculture raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. Liệu is 47 years old and she is married with two children. She is the leader of a 4-member group, the 020505050004 Đình Sen _ Hoằng Phong Solidarity Group. She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Liệu joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Liệu has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital. In the future, Liệu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good jobs, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Hạnh

texts.en:
Hạnh works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. She is 30 years old, and she is married with one child. Hạnh lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for eight years. The main hardship that Hạnh faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

In the future, Hạnh hopes to buy land of her own, to build a new house, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Rosa Esmeralda

texts.es: Rosa de 41 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus  hijos de 20, 18, 15, 11 y 6 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que pone todo su esfuerzo cada día para salir adelante con su familia, por lo que desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de pescado fresco y seco en un pequeño local del mercado municipal. Rosa desea cambiar las puertas y ventanas de su vivienda, pero sobre todo construir un pozo de su vivienda ya que desea contar con una fuente de agua para el uso de su hogar y es para ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: puertas, ventanas, cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para instalar puertas y ventanas y construir un pozo en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rosa is 41 years old and lives in her own house together with her husband and their children, who are 20, 18, 15, 11 and 6 years old. 

She is a hardworking woman who puts all her effort into getting her family ahead everyday. Because of this, she's earned a living for eight years selling fresh and dried fish in a small location in the city market. 

Rosa wants to change the doors and windows on her house, but above all, she wants to build a well for her home so she can have a source of water for home use. For this, she's asking FUSAI for a loan to buy doors, windows, cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to install doors and windows and build a well in her home.

loans.use: to buy doors, windows, cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to install doors and windows and build a well.

loans.name: Nhẫn

texts.en:
Mrs. Nhẫn works in agriculture raising poultry and cattle. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Nhẫn is 51 years old, and she is married with 3 children. She lives in Hoằng Hóa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoá province in Vietnam. This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main harship that Nhẫn faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet.

With her future profits, Nhẫn plans to buy more supplies and equipment for her business. She hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Khuyên

texts.en:
Mrs Khuyên works in agriculture, raising marine aquaculture. Khuyên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Khuyên faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

Khuyên is 51 years old, and she is married with three children.

Khuyên lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Khuyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Khuyên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find good jobs, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in wood, nails, wire and galvanized sheets to replace the kitchen roof.

loans.name: Tuyển

texts.en:
Mr Tuyển works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. He is 28 years old, and he is married with two children. He lives and works in Dong Son district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is his first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Tuyển has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Tuyển faces in his life is not having a latrine. He is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With his business profits, Tuyển hopes for his business to do well, for his family to be healthy and happy, and for his children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Angel Isaias

texts.es: Ángel de 22 años de edad es soltero y habita en casa propia al lado de su madre y su pequeño sobrino. Él es un hombre tenaz que se gana la vida con una tienda de productos básicos que tiene en su vivienda, pero además compra y vende ganado desde hace 3 años en su municipio. Ángel desea construir un cerco perimetral alrededor de su vivienda ya que desea tener una mayor seguridad, además desea construir una canaleta que le permita sacar aguas grises y la lluvia ya que en invierno el agua se empoza provocando la anidación de mosquitos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, hierro y tela metálica para construir un cerco perimetral y una canaleta alrededor de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ángel is 22 years old, and he is single. He lives in a house of his own next to his mother and his small nephew. He is a hard-working man who earns a living with his store selling basic products form his home. He has also purchased and sold cattle in his municipality for 3 years. 

Ángel wants to build a perimeter fence around his home because he wants more safety. He also wants to build a rock drain that removes greywater and rain, because in the winter the water wells up, which attracts mosquitos to build their nests. This is why he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to purchase cement, sand, bricks, iron and wire to build a perimeter fence and a rock drain around his home.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks, iron and wire to build a fence and a rock drain around his home.

loans.name: Nhóm 08 - Phố Xuân Minh - P.đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Dung operates a food stall selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell. Dung has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Dung faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Dung is 51 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Dung is the group leader of the Nhóm 08 - Phố Xuân Minh - P.Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

In 2013, Dung joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Dung has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Dung hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

Trong gia đình chị không có ai sống phụ thuộc.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Nhóm 14-Phố 5-Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Thanh is 40 years old and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. Thanh operates a food stall/restaurant selling seafood. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hadrship that Thanh faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more seafood to resell.

In 2013, Thanh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Thanh is the group leader of the Nhóm 14-Phố 5-Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of four members.

With her business profit, Thanh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more seafood to resell.

loans.name: Tuzamurane Group

texts.en:
Faustin is 58 years old and is a group leader. He is married with 12 children aged between 12 and 40 years, 3 of whom go to school. 

His group is called Tuzamurane which means “support each other” in English. They sell different products, and they wish to expand their businesses so they can change their futures for the better.  

Faustin sells livestock and has been in this business for 44 years. With his loan portion he would like to buy more sheep and goats to resell. 

The profits from Faustin's business will be used to both expand his business and renovate his house.

loans.use: to buy more sheep and goats to resell.

loans.name: Indahemuka Group

texts.en: INDAHEMUKA is a group led by Beathe, who is 39 years old. The group name means “Respectful” in English. She has been a group leader for six years, and she has a shop and has been in a business for six years. The group members sell different items and they have same ideas for changing their lives. With the loan, she would like to buy more sugar, rice and cooking oil to sell. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, rice and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Tuyết

texts.en:
Mrs Tuyết works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is 25 years old, and she is married with one child. She lives and works in Dong Son district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  She has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Tuyết faces in her life is not having a latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, bricks, and equipment to build a toilet.

With her business profits, Tuyết hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Kawudensiya

texts.en:
Kawudensiya is 59 years old. She is married with 8 children aged between 17 and 37 years, 3 of whom go to school.  

Kawudensiya sells vegetables and has been in this business for 18 years. With her loan, she would like to buy more tomatoes and cabbages to resell. 

The profits from Kawudensiya's business will be used to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy more tomatoes and cabbages to resell.

loans.name: Fidele

texts.en:
Fidele is 54 years old. He is married with three children aged between 8 and 14 years. All of them go to school. He has a shop and has been in this business for 10 years. 

With the loan, he would like to buy more sugar and cooking oil to resell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more sugar and cooking oil to resell.

loans.name: Nhóm 06 - Chợ Điện Biên Group

texts.en:
Ms. Hòa operates a food stall/restaurant selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase more vegetables to resell. Hòa has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Hòa faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Hòa is 58 years old, and she is single with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Hòa is the group leader of the Nhóm 06 - chợ Điện Biên solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

In 2010, Hòa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hòa has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Hòa hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheet, wood and nails to extend her home.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es: Mirian de 54 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en vivienda propia junto a sus 2 hijos de 15 y 13 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que lleva el sustento diario a su hogar gracias a su negocio de venta de cereales y carne en un pequeño local en el mercado municipal, por lo que se siente muy feliz de poder contar con esta fuente de ingresos económicos. Mirian desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para dar una mayor comodidad a su familia ya que siente que viven en hacinamiento, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, hierro y mano de obra para construir un cuarto dormitorio en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Mirian is 54 years old and a single mother. She lives in her own house with her two children, who are 15 and 13 years old. She is a resourceful woman who puts food on the table thanks to her business of selling grains and meat in a small stand in the municipal market. She feels very happy to be able to count on this source of income. 

Mirian would like to build a bedroom to give her family greater comfort, as she feels that they are overcrowded. That's why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, and metal, and to pay for labor to build a bedroom on her house.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick, and metal, and to pay for labor to build a bedroom on her house.

loans.name: Evanis

texts.en: Evanis is 56 years old. She is married with three children aged between 21 and 30 years, and all of them are married. She is a tailor and has been doing a business for 18 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more cloth for tailoring. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to buy more cloth for tailoring.

loans.name: Nhóm 06-Phố Xuân Minh-P.đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs Thanh operates a food stall selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell. Thanh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Thanh faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Thanh is 40 years old, and she is married with two children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

Thanh is the group leader of the Nhóm 06-Phố Xuân Minh-P.Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

In 2013, Thanh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Thanh has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Thanh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find good jobs, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Lazare

texts.en: Lazare is 41 years old. He is married with five children aged between 2 and 15 years, and three of them go to school. He sells sugarcane and has been in a business for five years. With the loan, he would like to buy more sugarcane to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more sugarcane to sell.

loans.name: Abadacogora Group

texts.en:
Vestine is the group leader. She is 41 years old. She is married with eight children aged between six and 22 years- six of them go to school. T

he group is called ABADACOGORA which means “encouraged people” in English. They sell different products, and they wish to expand their business in order to give them a better future.

Vestine sells food stuffs and has been in this business for 10 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more Irish potatoes to resell. The profits from the business will be used to expand her business and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more Irish potatoes to resell.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es: María tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. María es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia lo necesario. Ella desea mejorar las condiciones del techo de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera y hierro. Espera poder contar con este apoyo y de esta forma dar inicio a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: María is 33 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and children. María is a very hardworking woman who does everything in her reach to give her family what they need.  She wants to improve the roof on her house and that is why she has asked for a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying sheeting, wood and iron. She hopes to have this support so she can start the improvement as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, wood and iron to repair the roof on her house.

loans.name: Maria Telma

texts.es: María de 55 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 15 años de edad desde hace 8 años. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se gana la vida con la crianza y posterior venta de pollos,  actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años y que le permite mantener la estabilidad económica de su hogar. María desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que este se encuentra deteriorado y en época de lluvias las pocas pertenencias con las que cuenta se mojan por las filtraciones de agua del techo, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y alambre para cambiar el techo de su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar un poco la calidad de vida  de su familia.
texts.en:
María is 55 years old and has lived for eight years in her own house with her husband and her son, who is 15 years old. She is a hardworking woman who earns her living raising and later selling chickens. She has run this business for three years, and it allows her to maintain financial stability in her household. 

María would like to replace the roof of her house, as it is currently deteriorated; in the rainy season, the few belongings that she has get wet because of the water leaking through the roof. That is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, nails, and wire to replace the roof of her house. This way, she will improve her family's quality of life a bit.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, nails, and wire to replace the roof of her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel and rocks to build a retaining wall in her home.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: María tiene 40  años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. María se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras y es así lleva el sustento a su hogar. Ella ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento,arena, ladrillo, hierro, grava, etc. dado que desea encementar el piso de la vivienda y construir un muro al rededor de la vivienda, espera poder contar con este financiamiento y de esta forma mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old, and she lives in a home of her own with her husband and her children. María makes a living selling fruits and vegetables, and she supports her household in this way.

She has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to purchase cement, sand, bricks, iron and gravel, given that she wants to set the floor of her home in concrete, and she wants to build a wall around her home. She hopes to receive this financing and be able to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, bricks, iron and gravel to set the floor of her home in concrete and build a wall in her home.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.en:
Zulfiya is 44 years old. She is married and has two children. Zulfiya is a responsible mother and works hard every day to generate income so that she can cover her daily costs. 

Zulfiya is dedicated to her farming business, which consists of growing potatoes on her own land and raising cattle. In order to improving her family's living standards, she has worked hard for the past nineteen years from early morning until late evening. Currently, Zulfiya would like to develop her business and is asking for a 5,000 somoni loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and seeds for a new planting season. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and potato seeds

loans.name: Fidele

texts.en:
Fidele is 54 years old. He is married with 8 children aged between 6 and 23 years; all of them go to school.

Fidele sells construction materials and has been in business for 7 years. With the loan, he would like to buy more cement, paint and iron sheets to resell.

The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption and pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more cement, paint and iron sheets to resell.

loans.name: Nhóm 10-Phố 5-P.đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Hòa operates a food stall, selling soup. She is requesting a loan to purchase more food to make soup and cake for sale.

Hòa is 61 years old and she is married. Hòa is the group leader of the Nhóm 10-Phố 5-P.Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Hòa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hòa has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Hòa faces in her business is the lack of capital. Hòa has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Hòa hopes for her business to do well,  to build a new house,  and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more food to make soup and cakes for sale

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: María tiene 53 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos. María es una mujer increíble quien se gana la vida por medio de la elaboración de comales de barro. De esta forma es como junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. María desea reparar el techo del corredor de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera y hierro para dar inicio a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: María is 53 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and children. María is an incredible woman who earns a living making comales out of clay. That is how, with her husband, she supports the household. María wants to repair the roof over the corridor of her house. That is why she is asking   FUSAI for this loan to buy sheeting, wood and iron to start the improvement as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, wood and iron to repair the roof over the corridor of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy out-of-stock items at her genge (grocery) store

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina is a snack food vendor from Ormoc, Leyte. She is 48 years old, married, and has seven children.

For the past fourteen years, Catalina has been selling snack foods, such as peanuts. Catalina is asking for a loan to buy more peanuts to sell to her customers. In the future, Catalina hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive. Moreover, she wants to save money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy more peanuts to sell to her customers

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta, 58 years old, raises and sells hogs. She is married, has seven grown children and lives in the town of Dulag, Leyte. Violeta is also engaged in a food vending business. She sells puto (rice cakes) and polvoron (a type of heavy, soft and very crumbly Spanish shortbread made of flour, sugar, milk, and nuts).

Violeta is asking for a loan to buy pig feed and to provide additional capital for food vending. She will be able to raise more pigs in a few months to come and to purchase more ingredients for the expansion of her food vending business. Slowly, she will be able to recover and start to manage her income. In the future, Viloleta hopes she will be successful in managing her current business for sustainable living.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and to provide additional capital for food vending

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a resident of Ormoc, Leyte. She is 28 years old, married and has two children.

Catherine has been engaged in the hog raising business for several years now. This is her source of income. Catherine is requesting to a loan to buy piglets to raise and animal feed. A loan will help her improve her hog raising business thus augmenting her income and profit.

In the future, Catherine has hopes of making her business a success. Moreover, she wants to save money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and piglets to raise.

loans.name: Wilfredo Concepcion

texts.es: Wilfredo tiene 56 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Wilfredo es un hombre increíble quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Él ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y hierro dado que desea reparar el techo de la vivienda dado que se encuentra en mal estado.
texts.en: Wilfredo is 56 years old. He lives in his own house with his family group. Wilfredo is an incredible man who does everything within his reach to give his family the best conditions in life. He has decided to ask FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized sheeting, wood and iron because he wants to repair the roof on his house because it is on poor conditions.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood and iron to repair the roof on his house.

loans.name: Noemy

texts.es: Noemy de 37 años de edad vive al lado de su esposo y sus 5 hijos de 17, 13, 10 y 3 años de edad y un niño de 7 meses de edad en vivienda propia. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado municipal actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años por lo que cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que la prefieren por los precios accesibles y su amabilidad al atender a sus clientes, gracias a ello logra sostener la economía de su familia. Noemy desea comprar dos puertas para su vivienda ya que las que tiene actualmente se encuentran deterioradas por lo que no le brindan mayor seguridad, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: dos puertas para instalar en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Noemy, 37 years old, lives alongside her husband and their 5 children aged 17, 13, 10 and 3 and a 7 month old baby in their own home. She is a hardworking woman who works selling vegetables in the municipal market, an activity which she's been doing for the past three years. Therefore, she has a large quantity of customers who prefer her because of the affordable prices and her friendliness upon tending to her customers. Thanks to that, she achieves sustaining the economy of her family.

Noemy wishes to buy two doors for her home since the ones she currently has are found to be deteriorated, thus they do not provide good security. Therefore, she is applying for a loan from FUSAI to invest in: two doors to install in her home.

loans.use: to invest in: two doors to install in her home.

loans.name: Alfred's Group

texts.en:
Alfred  is 50 years old and has 6 children. He is a group leader who is representing his group of 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. 

Alfred  has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of his desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Although he described his last harvest as good, Alfred believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Alfred also decided to purchase two solar lights as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to reduce consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Alfred's Group will be able to receive a total of 10 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and to gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Twizamure Group

texts.en: Esperance, age 27, is a group leader. She is married with two children ages 2 and 5 years, and one of them goes to school. The group is called TWIZAMURE means “support each other” in English. They sell different products and they wish to expand their businesses to make their futures better. She has a shop and has been in a business for six years. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, sugar, biscuits and juice to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand in her business and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more rice, sugar, biscuits and juice to sell.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is an 18-year-old woman from Tbilisi, the capital of Georgia. She lives with her husband and earns a living with transfers from abroad. Both Sonia and her husband don't have any work and have a great desire to generate their own income. Sonia decided to open a dog salon as this kind of business is in high demand and she thinks it will be lucrative. Sonia purchased some materials and started renovating the workplace, but she hadn't saved enough money for all of the salon equipment. 

Sonia requires financial support and applied to local financial institutions to get a loan. Her loan request was rejected several times because she hasn't enough income or business experience. The start-up program, a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, enabled her to get 2,400 USD for her new activity. The program gives people a chance to start or re-start their own businesses. Sonia will use the loan to purchase all needed equipment and to make a sign advertising the salon. The business will be a great help for this motivated woman and her family as the salon will be a significant source of income for them and will give them a chance to have financial stability.

loans.use: to finish renovating the dog salon and open it

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: sand, gravel, cement and labor to cement the floor of her home.

loans.name: Margaret's Group

texts.en:
Margaret is a 42-year-old proud mother of 8 children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of 13 farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2014, Margaret has noticed that she has had more profits from each harvest.

Margaret described her harvest as excellent last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing two solar lights, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Margaret’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.5 acres of land and purchase a total of 6 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and to gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Ratifa

texts.en: Ratifa is an active client of Humo. She is 52 years old. She lives with her 2 sons, a daughter-in-law, and her husband in the town of Isfara. Her husband is engaged in animal husbandry. Ratifa was involved in buying and selling grocery products 5 years ago, but unfortunately, because of a lack of money, she could not continue her work. She would now like to start a new bakery business. She plans to cook the national bread known as "Fatir," cakes, and cookies. With the requested loan, she buy the necessary equipment for cooking. Ratifa hopes that with support of Kiva lenders she will be successful in her new business.

loans.use: To purchase the necessary equipment for baking

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
Mirasol, 36, is a resident of Mcarthur, Leyte. She is a married woman with four children. Her oldest child is 10 and the youngest is 3 years old. 

Mirasol supports her growing children by fishing. She sells fish to residents of the nearby towns.  She has requested a loan to buy fishing net and fish feeds. These are very important tools in making great improvement to her fishing livelihood. With these supplies, she hopes to gain more catch, which would allow her to settle her obligations and manage her finances. She could prepare healthy diets and provide better living conditions for her family.

In the future, Mirasol will exert effort, and she is determined to handle her source of income properly for the improvement of her livelihood and in order to continue to finance the studies of all her children.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and fish feeds

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos de 27 años de edad vive al lado de su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 10 y 8 años de edad en vivienda propia. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida repartiendo cilindros de gas propano en el municipio de forma domiciliar, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años y que le permite sostener la economía de su hogar tratando de darle lo mejor a su familia apoyado de su trabajo. Marcos desea instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda ya que actualmente no cuenta con este servicio, por lo que desea realizar dicha instalación lo antes posible y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: alambre eléctrico, caja térmica, toma corriente y mano de obra para instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Marcos, 27, lives alongside his wife and their two children, ages 10 and 8 in their own home. He is a hardworking man who earns a living distributing propane gas tanks to people's homes in the municipality. He has been doing this activity for the past three years; it lets him sustain the economy of his home, trying to give the best to his family supported by his work.

Marcos wishes to install electricity in his home since currently he doesn't have this service. Therefore, he wishes to carry out said installation as soon as possible and for that, he is applying for a loan from FUSAI to buy: electric wire, a thermal box, an outlet and labor to install electricity in his home.

loans.use: to buy: electric wire, a thermal box, an outlet and labor to install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en: Saima, age 27, is a married woman. Her husband is also shown in the photo. They are loving parents of two kids: one daughter and one son, who are both also shown in the picture. Saima’s husband is a driver. He has been providing transportation services for many years. His vehicle now requires maintenance to keep it running reliably. Saima has applied for a loan of 25,000 PKR from the Kashf Foundation for her husband. It will allow him to buy new tires and some spare auto parts to drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some spare parts

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen, age 42, is a married woman. Her husband appears with her in the photo. For the past 7 years, Nasreen has been involved in a business stitching bed sheets and covers. After purchasing cloth from the market, she sews bed covers, pillows and spreads. She earns a good amount of income to contribute to the family's income. To improve her business, she has borrowed a loan of 35,000 PKR from Murabaha to purchase cloth in different colors and designs, spools of thread, ribbons and needles. Nasreen aspires to save money for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to purchase cloth in different colors and designs, spools of thread, ribbons and needles.

loans.name: Tupatane Group

texts.fr: Furaha est commerçante, membre de la banque villageoise Tupatane, cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 42 ans, mère de 8 enfants dont 3 scolarisés  et 5 n’étudient pas. Elle commença son business avec de fonds de reçu de son mari. Elle est sociétaire d’une boutique avec divers articles manufacturés. Elle va acheter les savons, bougies, sardines, biscuits, stylos, cahiers etc. Son conjoint est un commerçant. Elle souhaite obtenir plus des crédits pour accroitre son chiffre d’affaires, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish,  elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.Il sied de rappeler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en: Furaha is an entrepreneur, a member of the Tupatane banc villageois and a client of the Hekima microfinance institution. She is married, 42 years of age, and has eight children, three of whom go to school. She launched her business with the funds received from her husband. She is a shareholder of a store selling various manufactured goods. She will buy soap, candles, sardines, cookies, pens, notebooks, etc. Her husband is an entrepreneur. She would like to keep obtaining loans in order to increase her sales figure and provide for her children's schooling and food. Finally, Furaha thanks Hekima for its support of entrepreneurs who do not have access to traditional banking. It should be noted that one of the clients is holding her child.

loans.use: to buy soap, candles, sardines, cookies, pens, notebooks, etc.

loans.name: Rovencio

texts.en:
Rovencio is a farmer from Dulag, Leyte. He toils the land and grows rice. Aside from farming, he also raises and sells hogs. He is a 41-year-old married man with six children. His oldest child is 12 and the youngest is 1 year old.

He is asking for a loan to buy a tractor and pay for the laborer. These tools are very important in transporting the yield going from the farm. With these, it also creates an ease on his daily routine on the farm. Slowly, Rovencio will have to augment his income and start to improve his daily living. 

In the future, he would like to expand his farming livelihood for the welfare of his growing children.

loans.use: to buy a tractor and pay for the laborer

loans.name: Noreen

texts.en: Noreen, age 33, is a married woman with six children; one of her sons is also shown in the photo. She has been involved in a tailoring business for about 5 years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and members of the local community. Noreen earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue operating her business, she has availed Murabaha of a loan of 20,000 PKR to buy a stock of threads in different colors and packs of zippers, buttons, etc. to meet increasing demand and generate a healthier income.

loans.use: to buy thread, zippers, buttons, and other sewing supplies

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen, age 37, is a married woman. Her husband (also shown in the photo) has been involved in the business of selling animals for many years. After buying small animals, he raises them for a year or two; he then sells them to the people of his locality. He earns sufficient income to provide his family with basic necessities. To improve her husband’s business, Nasreen has availed Murabaha of a loan of 20,000 PKR for her husband to purchase more baby goats to inflate his sales and profits.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en: Tahira is a 42-year-old married woman who, for many years, has been selling animals with the help of her husband (also shown in the photo). Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is a mother of three children, and Tahira is very motivated to provide them with a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing. To improve her business, Tahira has sought a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR to purchase more animals to increase her sales to generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales to generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Hello Kiva Lenders!

Meet Thomas, a devout family man and farmer. Thomas and his family, like any other typical Kenyan family, understand that communication is key in every family setup. Mobile phones have hence become a basic need, and the family has not been left out in acquiring some for family and business purposes. With the scarce access and availability of electricity, charging their mobile phones has become an extra cost for Thomas and his family. Thomas thus kindly requests a loan to purchase the Pro 2 Solar Lantern to provide adequate energy to charge their mobile phones as well as lighting in their home.

loans.use: To purchase a solar lantern

loans.name: Eufrocina

texts.en: Eufrocina is a sari-sari or retail store owner from Ormoc, Leyte. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. A mother of two grown children, Eufrocina has operated her store for several years now. Eufrocina is asking to take a loan to buy more stocks to sell, such as rice, canned goods, noodles, condiments, soap, toiletries, bread and biscuits,  among others. This loan will improve her inventories, thus attracting more buyers to her store. In the future, Eufrocina hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell, such as rice, canned goods, noodles, condiments, soap, toiletries, bread, and biscuits, among others.

loans.name: Basiya

texts.en: Basiya is a 45-year-old married woman running a business purchasing and selling animals. Her business has provided her family with a decent life. Basiya is very motivated to provide her family with a beautiful life and good education, food and clothing. She has currently accessed a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.name: Dorina

texts.en: A 37-year-old married woman, Dorina is engaged in a hog-raising business. She is married and has three children ages 8, 6 and 5. Dorina has been in the hog-raising business for more than three years now. This is the source of her income. Dorina is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise as well as animal feed. A loan is what she needs in order to improve her hog-raising business and income. In the future, Dorina has hopes of making her business more stable and productive. She also wants to save money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and animal feed

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose es un hombre de 48 años de edad, casado, tiene 2 hijos, un varón de 8 años y una mujer de 7 años, y se dedica a la producción de zapatos artesanales.
Él es emprendedor, independiente, constante, diciplinado, responsable y trabajador. su labor la realiza en la zona 'villa copacabana' un área caracterizada por el comercio mayorista; camiones cargados de frutas, verduras y carne llegan desde el norte para ser comercializados en el lugar y por mayor. De clima frío y seco con fuertes vientos que llegan de la cordillera. Jose es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza, su vida la comparte con su esposa que se dedica al comercio y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable y electricidad. su negocio es la fabricación zapatos artesanales, como; zapatos, botas, zapatillas de enfermería etc. "aprendí mi oficio de mis padres y actualmente tengo mi taller propio de zapateria con el cual pago los gastos de mi familia..." comenta.  su sueño es terminar de construir su casa. el desea invertir en la compra de insumos y material de trabajo para su negocio, además comprará una máquina recta para su negocio. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que viene realizando esta actividad de manera independiente.
es por esos motivos que jose solicita un préstamo para la compra de material de trabajo para su zapateria.
texts.en:
Sr. Jose is 48 years old, married, and has two children (a  8 year-old son and a 7 year-old daughter). He produces handmade shoes such as boots, nursing slippers, and other types of footwear. His workshop is located in the District of Villa Copacabana in the city of La Paz.  This is the second loan he has taken with Emprender. 

Jose will use the loan to invest in the purchase of supplies and work materials for his business. In addition, he will buy an upright sewing machine for his business. The reason he is requesting this loan is because he is short of cash. Sr. Jose faces challenges in his business. For example, his workshop is currently not suitable for his business, so he must depend on other shoemakers to finish the work. He will utilize the benefits of this loan to buy leather and imitation leather in bulk, which will reduce his costs. Jose will also buy an upright sewing machine for his wife so that she can help with the business.

His wish for his business is to build an adequate space for his workshop so that he can have all the machines that are needed to do a good job.

loans.use: to buy material and a sewing machine for his shoemaking business.

loans.name: Shehla

texts.en: Shehla, age 31, is a married woman with eight children. With the help of her husband (also shown in the photo), she is running a successful business selling animals to give her family a decent life. She buys baby goats at low prices and, after raising them a year or two, her husband sells them out in their locality. Currently she has availed herself of a Murabaha loan of 20,000 PKR to purchase more baby goats to increase her sales, to fulfill her dream of providing basic necessities to her family.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats to increase her sales, to fulfill her dream of providing basic necessities to her family.

loans.name: Cleofe

texts.en: Cleofe is a 43-year-old married woman and a mother of five children from Ormoc, Leyte. She has been engaged in a hog raising business for more than 5 years. Cleofe is asking for a loan to buy animal feed and more piglets to raise. The loan will help Cleofe improve her hog raising business as well as her income. In the future, Cleofe hopes to make her business successful and productive. Moreover, she wants to save money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and more piglets to raise

loans.name: Shakeela

texts.en: Shakeela, age 27, is a married woman. Her husband is a tailor by profession and is shown in the photo with her. He stitches clothes for the people in his community and makes a sufficient amount of income to contribute to the family income. He is a well-known tailor in their locality. To improve her husband’s business, Shakeela has requested a loan of 25,000 PKR from Murabaha. This allowed him to purchase a new stitching machine to meet customers’ orders on time, so that he can make a good amount of income.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine to meet customers’ orders on time, to make a good amount of income.

loans.name: Shaheen

texts.en: Shaheen, age 46, is a married lady. With the help of her husband, and to help give them a decent life, she is running a successful business selling goats. She buys baby goats at low prices and after raising them for a year or two, her husband sells them out in their locality. Currently she has requested a loan of 20,000 PKR from Murabaha to purchase more baby goats, to increase her sales and fulfill her dream of providing basic necessities to her family.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats, to increase her sales and fulfill her dream of providing basic necessities to her family.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en: Julieta is a married woman and a mother of three children from Ormoc, Leyte. Julieta runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. For more than three years now, Julieta has operated her store, thus earning an income. As of now, she is requesting a loan to buy more stock to sell like rice, canned goods, noodles, soap and detergents, soft drinks, cooking oil and condiments, among others. She believes that a loan will help her improve her stock, thus attracting more buyers in her store. Julieta dreams of making her store business more sustainable and profitable.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like rice, canned goods, noodles, soap and detergents, soft drinks, cooking oil and condiments, among others

loans.name: Gerlyn

texts.en: Gerlyn is a 29-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Ormoc, Leyte. She has been engaged in a hog-raising business for more than two years. Gerlyn would like to request a loan to buy piglets to raise and animal feed. A loan will help her improve her hog-raising business as well as her income. In the future, Gerlyn hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive.  Moreover, she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise and animal feed

loans.name: Fahrije

texts.en:
Fahrije wants to buy a dairy cow with the loan that she is requesting from Kiva lenders. She is 53 and married, and has a 23-year-old son who works for pay. 

Fahrije’s focus all along has been in agriculture; specifically, she plants fodder for the animals and sells it to villagers in the villages around her. She has no animals at the moment, and the idea of having a dairy cow has excited her. Very long ago she had one, but sadly, it passed away. She had no money to buy one until recently, when she was approached by a loan officer of our institution with a possibility of helping her out through a start-up loan.

Kindly note that in the communist era, the village where Fahrije lives acted as a concentration camp for individuals and families who had political views other than those considered ‘legitimate.’ Thus, almost everyone here came from other regions and places of residence like Fahrije did.

loans.use: to start a livestock farm activity by buying one dairy cow

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.en:
This young lady's name is Nasiba. She is 24 years old and is already divorced from her husband. Nasiba has a little son who is three years old. She and her son live with her mother in Khujand city. After a failed marriage, Nasiba pulled herself together and started to live differently. She opened her own small trading business and for three years has been selling fruit in the market. Income from the sale permits her to ensure their little family's living.
The purpose of this loan is to purchase an assortment of fruits for resale. Nasiba needs this loan to continue her business.

loans.use: To purchase fruit for resale

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana tiene 24 años de edad y desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica a la venta de ropa. Dicho negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que ha tomado de decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir para la su negocio, dado que desea aprovechar esta temporada que es cuando más demandan sus productos. Con el monto comprará variedad de prendas de vestir como: faldas, vestidos, ropa interior, pantalones, ropa de cama, ect.
texts.en:
Ana is 24 years old and has been working in clothes retail for a long time. 

As her clothes business is her main source of income, she has decided to request a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying a larger quantity of clothes items for her business. By doing this, she hopes to take advantage of the high-season in terms of demand. 

She will use the money to buy clothes items such as: skirts, dresses, underwear, trousers, bed linen etc.

loans.use: to buy skirts, dresses, underwear, trousers, bed linen etc.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en: Luz is a 46-year-old married woman and a mother of six children from Ormoc, Leyte. Luz wants to earn a living, so she decided to build a small sari-sari or retail store business. Luz is requesting a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soft drinks and beverages, soap and toiletries, rice, condiments and cooking oil, bread and snack foods. A loan will enable Luz to start her dream store, which will attract buyers. In the future, Luz hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive. Furthermore, Luz wants to save money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soft drinks and beverages, soap and toiletries, rice, condiments and cooking oil

loans.name: Ma. Rosa

texts.en: Ma. Rosa is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Ormoc, Leyte. She has been engaged in food vending for more than three years now. She sells home cooked foods and barbecue to the people in her locality. Ma. Rosa is also engaged in a hog-raising business. Ma. Rosa is asking for a loan to buy more food products like meat, cooking oil and condiments, rice, and soft drinks, as well as additional piglets to raise. This loan will help Ma. Rosa to improve her business and income.

loans.use: to buy more food products like meat, cooking oil and condiments, rice, and soft drinks, as well as additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: María tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hijo de 13 meses de edad. María se gana la vida por medio de la elaboración y venta de cestas las cuales son muy demandadas por sus clientes. De esta forma apoya con los gastos del hogar y junto  a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. María desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc.
texts.en:
Maria is 32 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and 13-year-old son. Maria makes a living by making and selling baskets which are in high demand from her customers. 

By doing this she manages to contribute to the household expenses and, along with her husband, make ends meet. 

Maria is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, bricks and iron etc she she can fulfil her dream of building a bedroom.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks and iron etc to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Gultakin

texts.en:
Gultakin is a 34 year-old refugee. She is married and has two sons. They have lived in an IDP settlement for a long time. Her husband is a labourer and tries to earn money for his family as much as he can. Additionally he helps his wife to raise fruit and sell it at a local bazaar. 

Gultakin keeps a small garden and raises some fruit there. With her husband's help, she drives to the local bazaar every day in order to sell fruit and earn money. She comes back home very late. The monthly income is not more than 160 AZN.  The harvest from Gultakin's garden is weak and she needs to increase productivity. She applied for a loan of 1000 AZN in order to buy good fertilizers and build small greenhouse.

loans.use: to buy good fertilizers and build a small greenhouse

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 18 años, 11 años y 8 años de edad. María se gana la vida por medio de la elaboración y venta de cestas desde hace mucho tiempo. María desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava, hierro, para encementar el piso de la entrada de su vivienda  y para construir dos pilares de cemento en la entrada de su vivienda. Espera poder contar con dicho financiamiento y así dar inicio lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Maria is 38 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their three sons who are 18, 11 and 8 years old. 

For many years, Maria has been making a living by making and selling baskets. 

Maria is requesting a loan from FUSAI to fulfil her hopes to improve the living conditions of her house. She will use the loan to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron to cement the floor of the entrance to her house and to build two cement pillars at the entrance to her house.

She hopes that the loan can enable her to start her home improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, iron to cement the floor of the entrance to her house and to build two cement pillars.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en: Marina is a 39-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Ormoc, Leyte. She is engaged in the retail sale of bananas. Marina has been in this business for several years now. Marina is also earning an additional income through her hog-raising business. Marina is asking to take out a loan to buy more bananas to sell and piglets to raise. This loan will help her improve her business as well as her profits. In the future, Marina hopes to make her business a success.
