Moreover, she wants to save enough money to pay for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell and piglets to raise

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en: Narcisa is a 61-year-old married woman and a mother of two grown-up children from Ormoc, Leyte. She is engaged in the selling of fruits and vegetables. Narcisa has been in the business for several years now. Narcisa is requesting to take out a loan to buy more fruits and vegetables. This loan will enable her to increase her stocks, thus attracting more buyers to her store. In the future, Narcisa hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Natela

texts.en:
Natela is a 59-year-old woman from the Vani district. She lives with her 33-year-old invalid son Tariel, who is provided a small invalid pension by the government. This pension is not enough even for his medicines. 

Natela has a small amount of land where she grows nut trees and then sells harvested nuts locally. The family lives in poverty, so Natela decided to start an additional activity. The startup program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 1,000 GEL to start a trading business. 

With the received credit, she plans to purchase home products of linens, dishes, and clothes, and resell them with a price markup among her neighbors and villagers. Natela hopes that the business will be profitable and that she will be able to provide better living conditions for her invalid son. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to begin trading home products in order to improve living conditions for her invalid son

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 42 años de edad y habita junto a su esposo y sus cinco hijos de 15 años, 12 años, 9 años, 8 años, y 4 años de edad.  Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para apoyar junto a su esposo a sus hijos. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y hierro dado que desea reparar el techo de la vivienda que se encuentra deteriorado.
texts.en:
Juana is 42 years old and lives with her husband and their five children who are 15, 12, 8 and 4 years old. 

She is a hard-working woman who, along with her husband, does everything she can to support her children financially. 

She has decided to request a loan from FUSAI with the hope of improving her family's living conditions. 

She will use the loan to buy corrugated iron sheets, wood and iron because she wants to repair the roof of her house which is damaged.

loans.use: to buy corrugated iron sheets, wood and iron because she wants to repair the roof of her house which is damaged.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
The person in this photo is Jane: 40 years old, married, and living with her husband who supports her in raising the family. She is a mixed farmer and farms vegetables such as potatoes, cabbages and peas and she also does dairy farming.

She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2013 and has benefited from the group management, savings mobilization, entrepreneurship and financial management training.

From the training, she has been able to manage her business well and make good returns. She is borrowing a loan to further expand her business by buying dairy feeds and manure. She hopes this will improve her business and yield better returns to help her provide school fees for the children as well as better clothing.

Jane is thankful for Kiva and their lenders for the great support.

loans.use: To buy manure and dairy feeds that will boost her farming.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita tiene 62 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus cuatro hijos. Ella es una mujer increíble quien hace todo lo que esta en sus manos para llevar el sustento  a su hogar. Felicita se dedica a la venta de pan dulce desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida honradamente. Felicita solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lamina galvanizada y madera para cambiar el techo de la vivienda  que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado.
texts.en:
Felicita is 62 years old and lives in her own house with her four children. 

She is an incredible woman who does everything she can to support her household. 

For many years, Felicita has been making an honest living selling sweet bread. 

Felicita is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy corrugated-iron sheets and wood to change the roof on her house which has become damaged over time.

loans.use: to buy corrugated-iron sheets and wood to change the roof on her house.

loans.name: Abdunazar

texts.ru:
Абдуназар молодой  парень  22 лет.   Он не женат.  Абдуназар студент заочного отделения.  В свободное от учебы время зарабатывает мастером- ремонтником.  Он с детства увлекался  строительством и ремонтом домов, и это увлечение приросло в настоящее ремеслом, которым он  зарабатывает себе на жизнь.
 Абдуназар  узнав о  новом продукте «Тахсил»  обратился в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Он хочет оплатить договор обучения и также приобрести компьютер.Он заранее благодарит за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Abdunazar is a young 22-year-old man.  He is unmarried, and is currently studying in a distance-learning program.  In his free time apart from his studies, he works as a home repair contractor.  Building and renovating homes has held his interest ever since he was a child, and this interest grew into an actual trade he earns his living by.  

Abdunazar requested a loan from MDO Arvand after hearing about a new loan package called "Tahsil".  He wants to pay his tuition and also buy a computer.  He thanks you in advance for your support and trust.

loans.use: pay his tuition and buy a new computer

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a 36-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Ormoc, Leyte.

She is earning an income through her hog raising business. Rosemarie has raised pigs for several years now.  As of this time, she is requesting to take a loan to buy piglets and animal feed. A loan will help her improve her hog raising business thus augmenting her income.

In the future, Rosemarie wants to expand her business in order to generate more revenue. She also wants to save money for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy piglets and animal feed

loans.name: Ismoil

texts.ru:
Исмоил трудолюбивый мужчина 36 лет. Он  женат и имеет 3их детей.  Его жену зовут Санавбар. Она домохозяйка. Исмоил шофер. У него есть собственная машина марки "Лабо". Он перевозит товары и многое другое. Его деятельность приносит хороший доход в его семью. Кроме этого у него есть виноградник. Ео жена и дети помогают ему в сельском хозяйстве. 
В данное время Исмоил вместе со своей женой хотят построить дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Исмоил обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Ismoil is a hardworking 36-year-old man.  He is married and the father of three children.  His wife's name is Sanavbar and she is a homemaker.  Ismoil himself is a driver.  He has his own car, a "Labo".  He transports merchandise and many other goods.  Thanks to his activity, he brings a good income to his family.  In addition, he owns a vineyard.  His wife and children help him with this agricultural business.

At the moment, Ismoil and his wife want to build a house, in order to improve their living conditions.  For this reason, Ismoil has turned to MDO Arvand to request a loan to buy some building materials for the construction of their house.  He is looking forward to a positive outcome, and thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is a merchant from Ormoc, Leyte.

She is engaged in the retail sale of root crops like sweet potato and vegetables. Nenita has been in the business for more than 4 years now. Nenita is asking to take a loan to buy more vegetables, fruits and root crops to sell to the market.  A loan will help her improve her sales and profit.

In the future, Nenita dreams of making her business more stable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables, fruits and root crops to sell to the market

loans.name: Kwimage Group

texts.en:
Sarafina, aged in her early forties, is married and has got two grown sons. She has been supporting her family by running a business selling fish for three years now. She starts working at 6 a.m. until 10 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This is her first credit request from Tujijenge Tanzania and it is to be apportioned among five members. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

She will use this loan to buy stock of fish to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to sell more stock of fish. She will be so thankful with everyone who will support her group.

loans.use: to buy stock of fish to resell

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: María tiene 51 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 19 años, 16 años y 14 años de edad. María se dedica a la elaboración y venta de cestas desde hace mucho tiempo. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y hierro para invertir en la compra lámina galvanizada, madera y hierro para reparar el techo de la vivienda que con el tempo de ha deteriorado.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old and has for many years run a business making and selling baskets, earning a living and providing for her family. She is married and lives with her husband and the couple's three children, ages 19, 16, and 14, in a home that the family owns.  

María is applying for a loan from FUSAI because she would like to improve the family's living conditions. The roof on the family's home has deteriorated due to the weather. María will therefore use the loan funds to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, and iron for repairs to the roof on her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, and iron for repairs to the roof on her home.

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es: José de 24 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su grupo familiar. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida con su negocio de venta de pollos, actividad que realiza desde hace 1 año en el mercado de su localidad, por lo que se siente feliz de poder contar con este ingreso económico. José desea mejorar el área de su cocina ya que esta se encuentra deteriorada y no cuenta con mayor seguridad, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera, clavos y alambre para mejorar el área de la cocina y contar con un lugar más adecuado para preparar sus alimentos.
texts.en:
José is 24 years old and lives with his family in a home that they own.  He is a hard working man who earns a living through his chicken-selling business, and business that he has had for about 1 year in the local market.  He is happy to be able to count on this income.

José wants to repair his kitchen because it is in poor shape and it is not very safe.  For this reason he is seeking a loan from FUSAI to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, nails and wire to make the repairs in his kitchen.  This will allow him to have a more suitable place to prepare meals.

loans.use: purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, nails and wire to repair his kitchen.

loans.name: Jose Ernesto

texts.es: José de 36 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 3 hijos de 1, 3 y 7 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se desempeña como albañil independiente desde hace 15 años por lo que se siente feliz de poder contar con este ingreso económico para sacar adelante a su familia. José desea construir una pila en su vivienda que le permite guardar agua para el uso en su hogar, ya que la que tiene actualmente como se observa en la fotografía se encuentra deteriorada, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir una pila en su vivienda sabiendo que no deberá invertir en mano de obra porque el mismo construirá su pila.
texts.en:
José is 36 years old and lives with his wife, and their three children (aged 1, 3 and 7) in a home that they own.  He is a hardworking man who has worked as a mason for about 15 years.  He is happy to be able to have a steady income with which to get his family ahead.

José wants to build a sink in his home so that he can collect water to use in his home seeing as the one they currently have is in poor shape.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan from FUSAI to purchase cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to build the sink in their home.  He will not have to pay for labor because he will build the sink himself.

loans.use: purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build a sink in his home.

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.ru: Наргиза 20-летняя молодая девушка из северного района Спитамен. Она еще не замужем и живет с матерью. Наргиза очень активная и целеустремленная девушка. Она одновременно и учится и работает. Наргиза учится в Таджикском Государственном Университете Коммерции по специальности "Бухгалтерский учет и аудит". Она хорошая студентка и ей нравится изучать предметы по своей дисциплине. Также Наргиза в этом году поступила на работу в местный банк в качестве оператора. Она успешно совмещает учебу с работой. Единственной преградой для продолжения ее учебы в ВУЗе является нехватка денег для оплаты за учебный годовой контракт. Чтобы решить эту проблему она обратилась за кредитом. Наргиза очень надеется на вашу поддержку. Она хочет закончить ВУЗ и получить диплом о высшем образовании.
texts.en:
Nargiza, age 20, is a young woman from Spitamen, a district in northern Tajikistan.  She is not married yet and lives with her mother.  She is very dynamic and focused on her goals.  She works and studies at the same time, as she is enrolled at the Tajik State University of Commerce where she is majoring in accounting and audit.  She is a good student and enjoys the subjects that she has chosen.  

This year, Nargiza has also started to work as an operator at a local bank.  She successfully manages to combine her work and her studies.  The only thing that could stand in the way of her pursuing her studies is a lack of money to pay her annual tuition fees.  In order to solve this problem, she has applied for a loan.  She is looking very forward to receiving your support.  She wants to complete her studies at the university and receive a higher education degree.

loans.use: to pay her annual tuition fees.

loans.name: Tamar

texts.en:
Tamar, who is a 29-year-old married woman, lives in Oni district. She is the mother of 4 children and lives with her husband, mother-in-law and sister. The significant source of income is her husband's job, who works for the local border police and gets a fixed salary.

They take care of milking cows, a vineyard and nut trees. The family gets income from selling milk products and nuts at the local market, however the income isn't enough for an 8-member family. Tamar takes care of her 4 children and doesn't have her own activity. The family also generates income from an agricultural business.

In the region there is a high unemployment rate, but self-employment helps inhabitants to make living.  So, she decided to start a clothing trading business with a loan, but the local credit providers usually demand experience and some stable income from the borrowers. Tamar’s credit requests were rejected several times as she was unable to satisfy their requirements.

She received the credit in the framework of a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, a Startup Program that gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. Tamar will buy stock of clothing in Turkey at wholesale prices and will sell at increased prices in her community.  Tamar will be grateful for Kiva lenders' help and will highly appreciate it.

loans.use: to start a trading business with clothing and dishes

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela engages in the raising and selling of hogs. She is a 53-year-old married woman with a 16-year-old son. She lives in Dulag, Leyte. In addition to hog raising, she also runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells basic household commodities like eggs, sugar, bath soap, noodles, coffee and condiments.

She is asking for a loan to buy more groceries for the store like noodles, canned goods and beverages. With these, she could fill her store with a variety of stock, attracting more buyers to come and purchase. With these, she will be able to augment her income and start to handle her finances.

In the future, Adela would like to expand both of her businesses to become more sustainable and continue financing the studies of her child.

loans.use: to buy more groceries for the store like noodles, canned goods and beverages

loans.name: Fredy Martin

texts.es: Fredy de 26 años de edad es un joven responsable que habita al lado de su madre y su grupo familiar en vivienda propia. Él desde muy joven aprendió el oficio de mecánico de obra de banco por lo que se gana la vida elaborando puertas, balcones, verjas, etc. Actividad que realiza desde hace 10 años por lo que se siente feliz de poder contar con esta fuente de ingresos económicos. Fredy desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que este en época lluviosa presenta filtraciones que deterioran sus pocas pertenencias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: polines, pines y lámina galvanizada para cambiar el techo de su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar un poco la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Fredy is 26 year old, responsible young man who lives with his mother and his family in a home that they own.  From a very young age, he learned to work as a benchwork mechanic, which is how he makes a living making doors, balconies, gates, etc.  He has worked in this field for 10 years, and he is very happy to be able to count go this source of income.

Fredy wants to replace the roof of his home because now in the rainy season, the leaks cause damage to his few belongings.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan from FUSAI to purchase poles, pins and galvanized sheet metal to replace the roof of his home and improve the quality of life of his family.

loans.use: purchase poles, pins and galvanized sheet metal to replace the roof in his home.

loans.name: Mubarak

texts.en:
Mubarak is a 48-year-old IDP farmer. He is married and has three sons. The family are IDPs and live in an IDP settlement. Mubarak does everything in order to provide for his family. He keeps small lambs and fattens them. Then he sells the lambs to local cafes and at the local bazaar. 

Lambs are in high demand because their meat is very tasty and things made from wool are warm and comfy. Mubarak loves his job very much. He is a very friendly and cheerful man. He takes care of his lambs and tries to raise them healthy and strong. He applied for a 600 AZN loan in order to buy a lamb and two cows. He loves farming very much and wants to expand his farm and build a big farm for livestock in the future.

loans.use: to buy a lamb and two cows to expand his farm.

loans.name: Barfi

texts.ru: Барфи одна из жительниц района Варзоб. Ей 50 лет. Она жена и мать. Барфи работает уборщицей школе, параллельно она занимается шитьем одежды. Она шьет и женскую и детскую одежду. Барфи научилась шить у своей мамы. Она научила ее всем тонкостям данной деятельности. Барфи 22 года свой жизни посвятила к швейной деятельности и хочет сейчас улучшить процесс своей работы. И по-этому она обратилась за кредитом для купли новой швейной машинки. Сейчас Вы можете поддержать Барфи.
texts.en: Barfi is a resident of the Varzob district of Tajikistan.  She is 50 years old, a wife and a mother.  She works as a cleaning lady in a school, and in addition to this job, she sews clothes for women and children.  Barfi learned how to sew from her mother who taught her all the minor details of this activity.  Barfi has already devoted 22 years of her life to sewing and she now wants to improve her working conditions.  For this reason, she has applied for a loan to buy a new sewing machine.  Please support Barfi now.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en: Yolanda is a 34-year-old married woman and a mother of four children aged 15, 13, four and three. Yolanda lives with her family in Ormoc, Leyte. Yolanda earns a living through her hog raising business. Yolanda has raised pigs for more than three years now. Yolanda is asking to take a loan to buy more piglets to raise and animal feed. A loan will help Yolanda improve her business as well as her income. Yolanda’s future plans include the expansion of her business as well as the continuous schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and more piglets to raise.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea de 57 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace muchos años. Ella es una mujer que muestra su tenacidad saliendo adelante sola apoyada en su negocio de venta de plantas ornamentales la cual realiza desde hace 3 años. Andrea desea encementar el piso de su vivienda e instalar energía eléctrica en la misma ya que poco a poco la ha ido construyendo, pero actualmente no cuanta con la liquidez económica necesaria para realizar dichas mejoras, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, alambre eléctrico y mano de obra necesaria para instalar energía eléctrica y encementar el piso de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Andrea is 57 years old, has lived for many years with her family. She is a very determined woman who has run a business by herself for the past three years selling ornamental plants. 

Andrea has been building a house gradually, and would like to install a cement floor and electricity in the home. She currently lacks the funds to pay for these improvements, and is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI. She will use the funds from this loan for the purchase of cement, sand, gravel, and electrical wiring, and to hire workers to install electricity and a cement floor.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, and electrical wiring, and to hire laborers to install electricity and a cement floor in her home.

loans.name: Niso

texts.en:
Niso is 54 years old. She lives with her husband, 3 children, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. For over 10 years, Niso has worked on the farm with her husband. One of her sons is a labor migrant and the others help them in their work.

Now Niso would like to open her own business in animal husbandry for the welfare of the family. She wants to buy a few cattle, but she does not have enough money. Confident that with help from Humo and Kiva lenders, she will be able to start her new activity, she applied for a loan. 

Niso is grateful in advance for your understanding.

loans.use: to buy a few head of cattle to open a new business

loans.name: Juan Saul

texts.es: Juan de 20 años de edad vive al lado de su compañera de vida y su hija desde hace 3 años. Él es un hombre trabajador y responsable que se gana la vida con su trabajo como técnico de audio y ayudante de electricista en una empresa cercana a su localidad por lo que se siente feliz de poder contar con este ingreso económico ya que gracias a él logra mantener la economía de su hogar. Juan desea construir su vivienda ya que solo cuenta con el terreno para ello, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, hierro y pagar mano de obra para construir su vivienda ya que desea cumplir su sueño de contar con un lugar seguro donde vivir con su familia que son lo más importante para él.
texts.en:
Juan is 20 years old, and has for the past three years lived with his wife and their daughter. He is an industrious and trustworthy young man who earns a living as an audio technician and electrician's assistant at a local business. Juan is happy that he can rely on this income, which allows him to support his family. 

Juan would like to build a home, and already has a plot of land for the house. He's therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI for the purchase of cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and iron, and to hire laborers for construction of his home. Juan wants to realize his dream of having a safe place where he can live with his family, the most important thing he has.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and iron, and to hire laborers for the construction of his home.

loans.name: Muhayo

texts.ru:
Эту талантливую женщину зовут Мухайё. Она дома занимается шитьем национальной  женской одежды на заказ. Ей удобно шить на дому. Мухайё добрая и шустрая женщина, которая хорошо справляется со своей работой. Она научилась шить и кроить женскую одежду 8 лет назад и по сей день продолжает свое любимое дело.
 Мухайё в этом году исполнилось 48 лет. Она проживает в городе Худжанд с мужем, 23-летним сыном и матерью. К сожалению, её муж в настоящее время находится вдали от семьи – он на заработках в Российской Федерации, и каждый месяц отправляет деньги на нужды семьи. 
Благодаря своему умению Мухайё зарабатывает на жизнь и чувствует себя независимой женщиной. В швейном деле ей нравится ежедневный доход и общение с новыми людьми. Мухайё берет кредит, чтобы купить новую вышивальную машинку, чтобы улучшить процесс работы и приобрести много клиентов. Ее мечта - в будущем открыть свое ателье по шитью национальной женской одежды.
texts.en:
Meet Muhayo, a talented woman who offers her services as a seamstress and who enjoys sewing women's national dresses from home. Muhayo is a kind and smart woman and she works very well.  She learned to design and sew women's clothes eight years ago and she is still involved in this activity, which she loves.

Muhayo turned 48 this year.  She lives in the city of Khujand with her husband, her 23-year-old son and her mother.  Unfortunately, her husband is away from the family at the moment (he works in Russia and sends money to cover the needs of the family, every month). Thanks to the fact that she's making a living through her own work, Muhayo feels like an independent woman.  What she likes about her job is the income that she earns every day and the new contacts that she makes.  

Muhayo is now taking a loan to buy a new embroidery machine which will help her to improve her working conditions and to attract a large number of customers.  Her dream is to open her own dressmaker's shop one day.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine.

loans.name: Gustavo Abelino

texts.es: Gustavo de 30 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 3 hijos de 5, 8 y 11 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida como jornalero en una finca cercana, además cultiva tomates para obtener mejores ingresos económicos. Gustavo desea realizar la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: toma corriente, caja térmica, alambre eléctrico, etc., para realizar la instalación de energía eléctrica en su vivienda y de esta manera tener una mayor comodidad en su hogar.
texts.en:
Gustavo is 30 years old, married, and the father of three children, ages 11, 8, and 5 years old. The family lives in its own home. Gustavo is an industrious young man who works as a laborer at a nearby farm and also grows tomatoes in order to earn a higher income.   

Gustvao would like to install electricity in his home. He is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI so that he can purchase outlets, electrical wiring, a thermal breaker switch, and other supplies for the installation. This improvement to the home will provide Gustavo and his family more comfortable living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase outlets, electrical wiring, a thermal breaker switch, and other supplies for the installation of electricity in his home.

loans.name: Mazingira Group

texts.en:
Fatuma was born in 1968. She is married and has four grown children. She has been supporting her family by running a genge (grocery stall), selling fruits and vegetables, a business she has been with for ten years. Fatuma works from 5:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good profit each month.

This is her tenth credit request from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous credit to improve her genge stock by buying cooking oil, fruits, and vegetables. She managed to resell her stock and earned an extra income. Fatuma used the extra income to buy her family a plot of land and to start building on it.

Fatuma has successfully paid back all of her previous loans. She is so happy and thankful for everyone who has shown and keeps showing support to her group. In the coming years, she would like to finish building her family house.

With her new credit, she will invest part of it to buy genge items (fruits and vegetables) to resell. Fatuma will share this credit with her group, Mazingira, which consists of two members. The members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to resell in her genge (grocery stall).

loans.name: Margaret's Group

texts.en:
Margaret is a 58-year-old proud mother of nine children. She is a group leader, often described as a very reliable person, and is representing her group of eight farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Margaret has noticed that she has had a healthier life due to better nutrition.

Margaret described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Margaret’s Group will be able to plant a total of 3.75 acres of land and purchase a total of three solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Ejoheza Group

texts.en: Ejoheza is a group led by Therese, who is 50 years old. The group name means “better future” in English. She has been a group leader for seven years. She sells foodstuffs and has been selling in a business for 32 years. The group members sell different items and they have same idea for changing their life. With the loan, she would like to buy more beans, banana, cassava and potatoes to resell. The profits from the business will be used to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more beans, banana, cassava and potatoes to resell.

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Borrower Sawsan from Lebanon is a 41-year-old married woman with three children. Her husband is a construction worker.  For the last ten years she has worked as a private teacher to be able to provide her family, in collaboration with her husband, with a great financial support. 

Sawsan states that the financials at this moment are not satisfactory enough. This is why she is requesting today to get a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, as she wants to arrange a special room at her house and equip it with needed supplies in order to welcome more students and do it properly. Sawsan’s only worry is how to provide her students with a comfortable space and thanks to the Kiva loan, this can be realized.

loans.use: to arrange a special room at her house and equip it with needed supplies

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is a 39-year-old married woman and the mother of six children. She is from Ormoc, Leyte. She runs a small sari-sari or variety store business, selling food items and other goods to the people in her place. Olivia has been in this business for several years now.

Olivia is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, snack foods, condiments and other items. This loan will help Olivia to improve her inventory, thus attracting more buyers into her store.

In the future, Olivia hopes to make her business a success. Moreover, she wants to save some of her earnings for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, snack foods, condiments and other items.

loans.name: Souad

texts.en: Souad is a 53-year-old widowed Lebanese woman who is living independently. She has owned a clothing store since 1994 and she is specifically known for the baby clothes she sells. Souad is very sociable and welcoming, and always pleases her customers with her products. Souad states that her shop is all that she has, and she sacrifices her precious time to spend it there, to gain at the end enough of an income to live in good conditions. Presently, Souad needs to get a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase a large variety of clothes in order to increase her business sales. Souad is thankful for Kiva lenders and says that she is very eager to receive the funds and enhance her way of living.

loans.use: to purchase a large variety of clothes

loans.name: Maka

texts.en:
Maka is a 31-year-old farmer from the village of Kvaliti, in the western part of the country. She is married and lives with her husband, Mamuka. Mamuka works in a local manganese-producing company as a laborer. He also assists his wife in farming activities. The family owns 1,700 grape vines and sells harvested grapes. They also have 0.7 ha of agricultural land, where different vegetables are grown. They also have a cow. Harvest and cheese is sold in the local open market. 

The Start-up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, once enabled her to get a loan and she purchased a cow. Maka decided to start up an additional business and needs 3,000 GEL. She will start to trade clothes and will be able to get stable and increased income. She is very thankful to all Kiva clients who have already funded her past loan, and awaits your kindness once more.

loans.use: to begin to trade clothes

loans.name: Mirna

texts.en: Mirna, a borrower from Lebanon, is a 31-year-old married woman with one child. Determined after graduation, she started to work as a private tutor at her domicile. She states that she greatly likes her occupation, especially how she is helping students to reach higher educational levels in their life. Currently, she plans to receive a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase stationary and a table, which she will use to gather the students at teaching times. Mirna sends her sincerest thanks for your support and notes that this loan will definitely change her life.

loans.use: to purchase stationary and a table

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bread, vegetables, seasonings, meat, dairy products, fruits, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Zifaf

texts.en: Zifaf is a 34-year-old Lebanese married woman who lives with her husband and four children. She has owned a mini market since 2009 where she sells different types of dairy and daily products. At this stage, Zifaf needs to diversify her merchandise selection. That’s why she is requesting today to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase more provisions (water, bread, canned food, cheese, etc.) and be able to satisfy her customers' demands. As for the future, Zifaf wants to enlarge her shop further to attract more customers and therefore receive higher revenue.

loans.use: purchase more provisions (water, bread, canned food, cheese, etc.)

loans.name: Jesus Wilfredo

texts.es: Jesús de 32 años de edad es un hombre casado que habita en vivienda propia junto a su madre, su esposa y sus hijos, por lo que se siente feliz de poder brindarles un lugar donde vivir. Él es un hombre emprendedor que se gana la vida vendiendo frutas y hojas de huerta que cultiva en su hogar, pero además cuenta con un vehículo que le permite realizar viajes expresos para obtener mejores ingresos, el cual también utiliza para llevar sus productos a un pequeño local en el mercado municipal donde los distribuye. Jesús desea mejorar su humilde vivienda, la cual está hecha de lámina por lo que él desea cambiar el material de la misma para poder brindar mayor seguridad a su familia, y para ello solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, hierro y ladrillo para construir su vivienda de cemento y ladrillo esperando brindar mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en: Jesús, 32 years old, is a married man who lives in his own house with his mother, his wife, and their children, for which he feels happy to be able to offer them a place to live. He is an enterprising man who earns his living selling fruits and vegetables that he grows at his home, but in addition, he has a vehicle that allows him to make express trips to get more income, and which he also uses to bring his products to a small retail space in the municipal market where he sells them. Jesús wants to improve his humble house, which is made of metal sheeting, and he wants to replace this material to be able to offer better security to his family. For this, he asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in cement, sand, gravel, metal, and brick to build his cement and brick house, hoping to offer better security for his family.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, metal and brick to build his cement house.
